summary: This document is a property card for a parcel located at 338 East Washington Road in Bradford, NH. It details ownership information, assessed value, land use, and building details for the property owned by the Yospin Family Trust.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is listed as the owner of the property under the Yospin Family Trust.

keyFacts: The property is owned by the Yospin Family Trust.
The assessed value of the property is $788,280.
The property was sold on December 20, 2017, for $1,050,000.
The property has a land area of 156 acres and is classified as residential.
The building on the property was built in 1800 and is in excellent condition.
